column2: Central Tyrian and Maguuma Ascended Shinplates
You must own the Triumphant Armguards skin before you can purchase this armor.
Permanently gain 10%% bonus experience while in Draconis Mons. Stacks up to 3 times.
Double-click to combine with a Druid Runestone to create a Glacial Runestone.
You must own the Triumphant Epaulets skin before you can purchase this armor.
Damage your target and nearby foes. Inflict vulnerability on foes whose skills aren't active.
Bring the Aestus Runestone, Ignis Runestone, and Desecrator Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Explosive Entrance inflicts blindness when it hits. Additionally it dazes foes above the health threshold.
Ponder the rings in the central garden in Divinity's Reach.
You must own the Hero's Warhorn skin before you can purchase this weapon.
Created by combining 3 Mini Gold Llamas with an Essence of Llamatic Elegance in the Mystic Forge.

For a very limited time, a mini Super Spider, Super Bee Dog, and Super Monkey come together in this limited-edition collector's pack. Double-click to receive a mini each of Super Spider, Super Bee Dog, and Super Monkey. Combine the Mini Super Trio in the Mystic Forge with a Continue Coin to unlock the Mini Storm Wizard.
Throw tar at the target. Does extra damage if the commander has ordered ranged attacks.
Throw the Forged explosive to damage enemies and knock them back.
<c=@abilitytype>Explosions</c> grant stacking ferocity when they hit.
Complete the bounty for Uussh Visshta in Destiny's Gorge in the Crystal Oasis.

Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time. Combine the Mini Super Trioâ€”Series 3 in the Mystic Forge with a Continue Coin to unlock the Mini Super Queen Bee Dog.
An influx of murderous undead relentlessly hunt innocent worshipers of Grenth. Infiltrate the Underworld and join the struggle for control over the fates of the living and the dead.
Bring the Saurian Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Double-click to open. Contains 1 Drop of Liquid Karma and 10 Unbound Magic.
You must own the Hero's Pistol skin before you can purchase this weapon.
Double-click to combine with a Druid Runestone to create a Desecrator Runestone.
Bring 5 Fire Orchids and an Onyx Lodestone to Broadleaf on a ledge above the Savage Rise.
Throw your torch and burn your foe.
You must own the Hero's Spear skin before you can purchase this weapon.
Scalding Gorge: On a ledge high above, north of Sandstone Archway.
Titan's Throat: Underneath and to the east of the gate of fire.
Mariner Landing: In plain view near Sub Landing.
Commanding a squad with at least 5 people.
Bring a Fire Orchid to Rosewood on a ledge above the Ancient Hollow.
Eastern Boiling Sea: On the ceiling of a cave along the northern wall.
Complete the achievements for finding the Furniture Shops in both World 1 and World 2.
Plant 3 Fire Orchid Seeds in the garden of Dierdre's Steps in Mount Maelstrom.
A recipe to make a Sunset Amulet.
Call down energy from the sky to blast an area.
You must own the Triumphant Wristplates skin before you can purchase this armor.
Central Tyrian and Maguuma Ascended Legguards
Bring 3 Fire Orchids to Kodama in the Savage Rise.
Reward for placing first in PvP monthly tournaments.
Bring the Oakheart Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Remove 1 condition when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>
Analyze a disabled foe, applying vulnerability.
Slash the target. Does extra damage if the commander has ordered melee attacks.
Chest[s] of the Draconis Mons Hero
Purchased from Embalmer Boran at the Necropolis in the Domain of Vabbi.
Your pet recovers health each interval.
Cast Search and Rescue!" when you begin reviving an ally."
Wind Rider Ledge: On the northern side, in a ceiling crevasse.
-10%% Incoming Condition Duration; cleanse a condition from nearby allies after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 Mini Silver Llamas with an Essence of Llamatic Elegance in the Mystic Forge to make a Mini Fancy Silver Llama.
Trade in for Crimson Assassin weapon skins.
